Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.Utils.TreeViewMarkupString Class Reference Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.Utils.TreeViewMarkupString Inheritance diagram for Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.Utils.TreeViewMarkupString:
Collaboration diagram for Luthetus.Common.RazorLib.TreeViews.Models.Utils.TreeViewMarkupString:
Public Member Functions
TreeViewMarkupString (MarkupString markupString, IFileSystemProvider fileSystemProvider, IEnvironmentProvider environmentProvider, bool isExpandable, bool isExpanded)
override bool Equals (object? obj)
override int GetHashCode ()
override TreeViewRenderer GetTreeViewRenderer ()
override Task LoadChildListAsync ()
override void RemoveRelatedFilesFromParent (List< TreeViewNoType > siblingsAndSelfTreeViews)
RemoveRelatedFilesFromParent is used for showing codebehinds such that a file on the filesystem can be displayed as having children in the TreeView. In the case of a directory loading its children. After the directory loads all its children it will loop through the children invoking RemoveRelatedFilesFromParent on each of the children. For example: if a directory has the children { 'Component.razor', 'Component.razor.cs' } then 'Component.razor' will remove 'Component.razor.cs' from the parent directories children and mark itself as expandable as it saw a related file in its parent.
